name: City Slickers
title: Urban Population Concentration
description: In 2024, Georgia's urban population in cities with over a million residents reached 1,084,471, highlighting a significant urban concentration.

name: Business Haven
title: Top Business Location
description: Georgia scored an impressive 83.01 in the B-READY Business Location Overall Score for 2024, showcasing its appeal as a prime business destination.

name: Efficiency Experts
title: Operational Efficiency in Business
description: With a score of 95.50 in operational efficiency for establishing a business location and 98.23 for receiving financial services in 2024, Georgia excels in business operations.

name: Labor Leaders
title: Strong Labor Market
description: Georgia's labor market scored 83.46 in the B-READY Labor Overall Score for 2024, indicating a robust and efficient workforce.

name: Mastering Education
title: High Female Educational Attainment
description: In 2023, 27.39% of Georgian women aged 25+ had attained at least a Master's degree, reflecting a strong emphasis on higher education.

name: Education Investment
title: High Education Expenditure
description: Georgia allocated 38.20% of total expenditure in public institutions to current education in 2023, underscoring its commitment to education.
